changes.description: Add auction bid support with batch fetching and current bid display
Add hide alliance filter for personal contracts
Add right-click context menu to view parent container location
Include blueprint ME/TE/R info in copy output
Add double-click to open market in-game from market orders
Add sorting controls to character tabs (Mail, Skills, Clones)
Show courier reward as negative when you are the issuer
Fix price calculations and totals display
Sync search input field with context search value
Add useLocalStorageSort hook for DRY character tab sorting
